column3: Traffic;Phnom Penh:------ Two women were injured after a Prius drove head on into a road divider.------The incident occurred at about 2:30 am on May 6
column4: 2019.------According to a source from the scene
column6: there was a beautiful woman driving and two other passengers in the car
column8: which was driving down the Russian Federation road at high speed when it ploughed straight into the yellow and black striped concrete.------The women were taken to hospital and the car was sent to the Traffic Police Office.------ ------https://postnews.com.kh/local/437857
